items.title: Full rewrite of docs/00-SUMMARY.md to match v3 framing
items.description: docs/00-SUMMARY.md got a header patch but the body still references old framing concepts. Needs full rewrite to match v3 operational discipline positioning.
items.evidence: Tech-Debt judge flagged body content still has conceptual remnants of old framing despite literal string fixes

items.title: Remove stale factors/README.md (v1 index file)
items.description: factors/README.md (254 lines) is a stale v1 index file listing old factor names. Should be removed or replaced with a redirect to the main README.
items.evidence: File exists on disk but references old factor numbering and titles

items.title: Remove stale SVG badge references from README
items.description: README references docs/assets/ SVGs that may have been removed. Badge references need updating or removal.
items.evidence: Vibe report minor finding: README references docs/assets/ SVGs that were removed

items.title: Trim Factor VII from 4,264 to ~3,000 words
items.description: Factor VII (Extract Learnings) at 4,264 words significantly exceeds the 3,000-word content budget. Consider trimming verbose sections while preserving key content.
items.evidence: Content budget was 400-600 lines; Factor VII at 933 lines is the only outlier

items.title: Add exact section templates to parallel agent worker prompts
items.description: When spawning parallel agents to write content, include exact markdown heading templates (not just section names). 5/12 factors had inconsistent heading formats requiring post-wave fixes.
items.evidence: Wave 2 agents interpreted 'The Rule section' as h2/h3/no-article variants

items.title: Add GOALS.yaml check pre-validation step to /plan skill
items.description: Test GOALS.yaml checks against sample content before implementation begins. The Rule: check didn't match ## The Rule heading format, caught late in Wave 4.
items.evidence: GOALS.yaml Rule: pattern required colon but actual headings used ## The Rule without colon

items.title: Clean old factor names from out-of-scope explanation files
items.description: 4 explanation files not in epic 12-pr7 still contain old factor names: pattern-heritage.md (21 refs), beads-workflow-integration.md (5), faafo-north-star.md (3), ecosystem-position.md (4). Total 33 stale references.
items.evidence: Conformance check 2 found old factor names in unmodified files outside epic scope

items.title: Remove aspirational broken links or create stub guides
items.description: 3 broken links in getting-started docs point to team-workflows.md and platform-engineering.md which do not exist. Either remove the links or create stub guides.
items.evidence: Metadata verification found 3 broken links in quick-start.md and solo-developer.md

items.title: Subagents write results to files not context
items.description: During crank, 5+ agents returned full results into orchestrator context simultaneously causing Prompt is too long errors. Agents should write to .agents/rpi/results/<issue-id>.md and return only a signal. Filed as ag-o294 in agentops.
items.evidence: Epic 12-pr7 context explosion required recovery in new session

items.title: Add per-wave commit and link verification gates
items.description: Instead of accumulating all changes and running link verification as a final blocked issue, commit after each wave and run link verification as a post-wave mechanical check.
items.evidence: Issue 15 blocked by all 14 others created bottleneck; mega-commit complicates recovery
